then the whole Eclipse window disappears. Both eclipse and javaw processes

And that's the only thing in your log?  I can't reproduce this problem.  Is it
possible that you unzipped M5a over an older eclipse install?  If so, could you
try unpacking to a clean directory and try reproducing this again?

Created an attachment (id=18559)
Project directory for reproducing the problem

To reproduce the bug unzip test.zip preserving the directory structure, import
the project contained there and open External Tools dialog. If Eclipse does not
crash immediately try to select different launch configurations.

Created an attachment (id=18560)

I attached the complete .log file created at the time of the crash.

I've played around with your project but can't reproduce this.  Passing onto the
debug guys for comment.

Did you use the original M5a build? It looks like later nigtly builds are 
somewhat more stable but still crash around external tools from time to time.

I have not seen this particular problem but will attempt to reproduce with the 
test case.
